sequences.text: Tu peux maintenant créer des UGC super réalistes comme moi

description.text: A user types "A woman in the kitchen, holding a water glass" into the prompt field of the "Create avatar" modal.
A user reviews options in the "Create avatar" modal, hovering over the "Selfie" button, then activating the "Upscale" toggle, and finally positioning the cursor over the "Start generation" button.
The "Start generation" button in the "Create avatar" modal displays a loading animation after being clicked, indicating the avatar generation process is underway.

The video begins with a close-up view of a person's torso and arms, adorned with a brightly colored, intricate mandala-like projection. The central pattern features concentric rings of pink, orange, and yellow, surrounded by green petal-like shapes. Abstract, blurry green light effects form the background and appear to emanate from the sides. Over the first four seconds, the person's arms are observed to move subtly, shifting their position outwards and slightly away from the body, while the central projection remains consistent and vibrant.

sequences.text: Crée un nouvel avatar avec un simple prompt

sequences.text: Tu peux ensuite le modifier, par exemple

description.text: A user interacts with a web interface, where a mouse cursor moves to a text input field and types the sentence "The girl is holding the product from the second picture" to describe an image of a woman displayed on the screen. The interface shows a 'HOOK' application with various menu options.

sequences.text: en lui ajoutant un produit dans les mains.

sequences.text: Ensuite, crée ta vidéo comme tu as l'habitude et sélectionne ton avatar.

description.text: A user interacts with a web interface displaying a selected avatar named 'Kaelen'. The cursor moves to and activates a toggle switch labeled 'Use Mia 3.1 for avatar generation'.

sequences.text: Pour des résultats optimaux, teste notre nouveau modèle Veo 3.1

description.text: A user interacts with a web interface displaying a selected avatar named 'Kaelen'. The cursor moves to and activates a toggle switch labeled 'Use Mia 3.1 for avatar generation'.

The video begins with a close-up view of a digital, stylized globe, showing continents with a grid overlay and a textured, pixelated appearance. Initially, the focus is on India and the Middle East, with a bright, glowing white line originating from a point on India and curving outwards. As the sequence progresses, the globe appears to rotate or zoom, shifting the view to prominently feature Africa. The glowing line continues its path, extending over the Indian Ocean and towards Madagascar, suggesting global connectivity or data visualization.

sequences.text: En moins de 5 minutes, ton avatar réaliste est prêt à conquérir les réseaux !

description.text: The video begins with a close-up shot of a person's hand touching a smartphone screen resting on a wooden surface. As the sequence progresses, social media icons, including Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and Google+, begin to appear and multiply around the phone screen, indicating interaction with or a focus on social media platforms.
